title: fanoutqa: What are the genres of the top 5 selling ongoing manga series with at least 100 million copies sold (2209fedf425b575d)

chat_history.content: What are the genres of the top 5 selling ongoing manga series with at least 100 million copies sold

Here are the top five best-selling ongoing manga series with at least 100 million copies sold, along with their genres:

1. *One Piece* (1997 - present) - Written and illustrated by Eiichiro Oda, this ongoing manga series is a swashbuckling adventure set in a vast pirate world. The genres include action, adventure, fantasy, and comedy. *One Piece* has sold over 500 million copies worldwide, making it the best-selling manga series of all time.

2. *Golgo 13* (1968 - present) - Created by Takao Saito, this manga series follows the adventures of an aging assassin named Duke Togo, known as Golgo 13. It is known for its realistic and detailed artwork and adult themes. The genres encompass action, drama, thriller, and crime. *Golgo 13* has sold approximately 200-300 million copies.

3. *Detective Conan* (1994 - present) - Also known as *Case Closed* in some English translations, this manga series by Gosho Aoyama follows the story of a young detective who, after being transformed into a child, continues to solve mysteries. The genres include mystery, crime, and suspense. *Detective Conan* has sold over 250 million copies globally.

4. *Hajime no Ippo* (1989 - present) - Written and illustrated by George Morikawa, this manga series tells the story of a high school student who discovers his talent for boxing. It is known for its detailed boxing matches and character development. The genres include sports, drama, and slice-of-life. *Hajime no Ippo* has sold over 100 million copies.

5. *KochiKame: Tokyo Beat Cops* (1976 - 2016) - Created by Osamu Akimoto, this long-running manga series follows the daily lives of a group of police officers in Tokyo. It is known for its comedic style and portrayal of contemporary Japanese society. The genres include comedy, slice-of-life, and crime. *KochiKame* has sold over 156 million copies, making it one of the best-selling manga series.

Note: The sales figures mentioned are approximate and may vary depending on the source. These manga series are all popular for their unique storytelling, captivating art, and diverse genres, ensuring their enduring appeal to a global audience.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.
